name: 2023 Int'l Conference on Sociology of Education
content: 2023 Int'l Conference on Sociology of Education (ICSE 2023) will be held during Oct. 27-29, 2023 in Xi'an, China. This Conference will cover issues on Sociology of Education. The aim of ICSE 2023 is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their latest research results and advanced research methods.
